Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
aios.UserInterface
public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the User Interface Print screen stuff and read it

    • printOngoingTasks

      public static void printOngoingTasks​(java.net.URL url, long pendingBytes, long totalBytes, double currentPercent)
      Prints the ongoing tasks list
      Parameters:
      url - to know which is the download
      pendingBytes - to show how many bytes lasts
      totalBytes - to show how many bytes are in total
      currentPercent - to show the percentage that it takes
